
{{alias}}( z )
    Computes the absolute value of a complex number.

    The absolute value of a complex number is its distance from zero.

    Parameters
    ----------
    z: Complex
        Complex number.

    Returns
    -------
    y: number
        Absolute value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var z = new {{alias:@stdlib/types/complex128}}( 5.0, 3.0 );
    > var y = {{alias}}( z )
    ~5.83

    See Also
    --------
